wikipedia_page.main:
John Reddish (22 December 1904 – 18 October 1989) was an English cricketer.  Reddish was a right-handed batsman who bowled leg break googly.  He was born in Nottingham, Nottinghamshire.
Reddish made a single first-class appearance for Nottinghamshire against Oxford University in 1930.He died at Manchester, Lancashire on 18 October 1989.

response: Reddish was born in Croydon, New South Wales, on 19 May 1902, the eldest of three children to Major John Reddish, a School Inspector and Military Cadet Instructor, and Mary Lavinia Reddish (née Sanders).
